name: Carhartt Men's Loose Fit Midweight Logo Sleeve Graphic Sweatshirt
product_description: Born in 1889 and built from grit, Carhartt is the brand  hardworking people count on to get the job done. We make  durable women’s, kids’, and men’s clothing and gear designed to  last—whether it’s the Carhartt hat, hoodie, and sweatshirt you  reach for daily or a Carhartt jacket you throw on in the toughest  conditions. We’re much more than a maker of workwear and  clothes. We’re the official uniform for those who choose to tackle any rugged corner of the earth.  If you’re looking for high-quality men’s hoodies, the Loose Fit  Midweight Logo Sleeve Graphic Sweatshirt is as comfortable as  it is dependable when it’s time for long shifts and cold mornings.  This essential hoodie is made from a cotton blend that’s soft but  tough, with triple-stitched seams that hold up to hard work. The three-piece hood offers quick coverage when the wind picks up,  while the spacious front pocket keeps hands warm on the go. Top it off with a Carhartt beanie and you’re ready for whatever  the job throws your way. Our midweight hooded logo-sleeve sweatshirt comes in great colors. Made of a 10.5-ounce, 50% cotton/50% polyester blend, it features an attached hood with draw-cord closure, front hand-warmer pocket, spandex-reinforced rib-knit cuffs and waistband. The Carhartt logo is printed on the sleeve and a logo patch is sewn on the pocket.
